players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I believe Bob is the mafioso and we should vote him out today to protect the town."
Diana: "Why do you suspect Bob, Charlie? We need more evidence before voting."
You: "I think Charlie is trying to deflect suspicion. Why would he immediately accuse me without any evidence? That seems suspicious."
Diana: "I think we should discuss more before voting. Charlie, what makes you suspect Bob so quickly?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he's the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he's the mafioso. Diana, vote with me to eliminate him."

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I believe Bob is the mafioso and we should vote him out today to protect the town."
Diana: "Why do you suspect Bob, Charlie? We need more evidence before voting."
Bob: "I think Charlie is trying to deflect suspicion. Why would he immediately accuse me without any evidence? That seems suspicious."
Diana: "I think we should discuss more before voting. Charlie, what makes you suspect Bob so quickly?"
You: "I investigated Bob last night and confirmed he's the mafioso. We must vote him out to protect the town."
Bob: "I investigated Charlie last night and he's the mafioso. Diana, vote with me to eliminate him."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
